html:
12.30.20  4:19 pm   What's the weirdest place you've written a song in

      an airplane?

12.30.20  3:30 pm   Could i make a song thats both 30 bpm and 200 bpm at the same time?

      not really, but maybe could do 33.333333 and 200

12.30.20  2:12 pm   Why is everything weird 

      to get your attention

12.30.20  2:09 pm   What do you think of capital letters?

      it's like an easy second font, built in

12.30.20  1:51 pm   What's your favorite song?

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

12.30.20  1:40 pm   Sometimes I'll write an instrumental track that I think has a certain meaning to it, but as I keep writing it, my grip on that meaning starts to slide away. Does this mean the art just loses its purpose or what?

      you can lose touch with its purpose if you focus too hard on the same one for too long

12.30.20  1:15 pm   Why do you mention Alabama in your songs? I know you mentioned it in both "I like" and "in California"

      sing the word alabama. i dare you to not have a great time

12.30.20  12:48 pm   how are you so talented?

      i never figured out how to touch my own elbow. so needless to say i had to fill that time with other things

12.30.20  12:05 pm   How do you get comfortable playing around with key changes? 

      basically it's whenever you need it. if you need a key change, then it's obviously gonna be more comfortable to do it than to not do it

12.30.20  11:31 am   We're any of your songs partly influenced or inspired by a dream?

      yes

12.30.20  10:57 am   wus popping bill, do you ever think about using animation more

      yes i've thought about it a lot, but now i'm using it way too much, so i'm thinking about using it much less

12.30.20  9:50 am   could you post the new song on the 'songs' page without the video

      yes, that's what i always do. that page is audio only

12.30.20  8:49 am   Why Can't I remember my dreams sometimes?

      because they take place in a completely alternate world

12.30.20  7:56 am   Is it safe to assume that your next video is gonna be a pretty big one?

     no

      On the scale of your history videos maybe?

     not even close

12.30.20  6:54 am   what makes an egg not an egg

      maybe if you send it through a paper shredder

12.30.20  5:28 am   are all your songs in one universe?

     yes

     does the bill wurtz musical universe (bwmu) exist?

     it's just called the regular universe

12.30.20  4:15 am   what is the tempo of your new song? (very approximately)

      129

12.30.20  3:35 am   What do you think people did before ladders?

      try to make ladders

12.30.20  2:47 am   when will you finish learning your 3d stuff? I am just asking out of curiosity and i dont care even if it takes a decade

      that's the kind of thing you can keep learning forever, the more you do it

12.30.20  1:36 am   about how complete is the video for your new song? (express answer in terms of infinity)

      i'm fucked

12.30.20  12:50 am   What is the soup of the day?

      goup

12.30.20  12:46 am   Bill, where do you get your inspiration for some of your songs?

      on the stairs

12.30.20  12:27 am   isn't the purpose of a lock to turn a door into a wall?

      yes AND, back into a door..... for the right person

12.30.20  11:17 am   How do I contact Bill Wurtz? I need to ask him a question

      you can type something into the ask box

12.29.20  10:59 pm   Can you please type in capitals?

      sure. you will see me doing that a lot, if you are paying any attention whatsoever

12.29.20  9:30 pm   Are you active in the development and consumption of homemade pickled foods?

      no

12.29.20  8:35 pm   how are you so cool?

      could be a reflection of you

12.29.20  7:24 pm   Describe Albert Einstein in one word.

      person

12.29.20  6:32 pm   what's your opinion on chairs

      people should stand on them more often. incredible missed opportunity to see the world from a higher vantage point, perform soliloquys,

12.29.20  5:19 pm   what genre is your music?

      normal

12.29.20  4:04 pm   why do use lower case letters? is this your unique style?

      i think it may be time for you to take a cold hard look in the mirror

12.29.20  3:25 pm   will you make radio with me?

      sure

12.29.20  2:19 pm   do you ever think about words

      yes, also dream about them

12.29.20  1:55 pm   why is your content so incredibly amazing?

      to possibly.... 'influence' you

12.29.20  12:45 pm   which instrument do I hear at the beginning of It's Gonna Be Alright every 2nd and 4th beat?

      ah, that depends whether you think the tempo is 75 or 150

12.29.20  11:30 am   How do you get inspiration?

      inspiration is contagious

12.29.20  10:03 am   Did you really stop making video's?

      not even close

12.29.20  9:44 am   If you had to pick a month right now, which one would you pick to hold the release of your new video? 

      i should be releasing videos during every month or else my life is gonna continue to be all wrong, and miserable

12.29.20  9:18 am   I want to make a song but I can never translate my thoughts and ideas into lyrics. Any tips/advice?

      try using music

12.29.20  8:49 am   What musical genre do your songs fit into, if any?

      regular

12.29.20  7:04 am   What's the use of a mixolydian scale if I can't apply it well enough to write a decent tune?

      just write the songs you want. the only reason you might care to know whether it's mixolydian is in case you happen to be talking to another person who happens to know what mixolydian means, and you want to describe something when you are unable to play it for them due to restrictive social circumstances

12.29.20  6:47 am   how does the world work?

      it seems to rotate, in every direction simultaneously

12.29.20  6:38 am   Your videos are cool. Is that right?

      it could be, if i can do my job correctly

12.29.20  5:19 am   When you first started youtube, what kind of videos did you want to make? 

      i was making videos before i put them on youtube, but at the time i started putting them on there i'm quite sure i was wishing that i could do them better or longer or both. i still wish that

12.29.20  3:44 am   Why can't you upload your already finished videos right now?

     don't have any

     Do you have something in mind that is holding you off?

     no

12.29.20  2:17 am   One of my favorite keys+improv videos is your "i hope u dance". Do you have more like that that you can post?

     i have thousands but i can't post them until i edit out all the really bad parts, like i did for that one

     Seems like a fun and creative way to let go of the constraints of performing something "perfectly"

12.29.20  1:33 am   Why are you so great?

      this is to help me blend seamlessly into the fabric of society

12.29.20  1:22 am   what do you want to be when you grow up

      normal

12.29.20  1:13 am   When did all the windmills start to turn so slow?

      they have been spinning at the same speed this entire time, but your emotional perception of time may have changed

12.29.20  12:09 am   why do you make music?

      someone's gotta do it
